improvement_list.improvement_desc: The print statement at line 17 is never executed because the condition `running_sum == solution` is always false, according to the execution frequencies. This is a logic bug.  The algorithm calculates cumulative sums, but the test cases in `test_solutions` are not correctly set up to represent the cumulative sums of `test_nums`.

The inner loop iterates over `nums`. If `nums` is empty (as in the case of the 5th element of `test_nums`), then the loop body will not be executed at all. This is not an error but may indicate that a special case needs to be handled for empty lists.
